vectorData.altText: 27. Identify the class of epithelium A. Be specific.
That's right! Simple columnar epithelium is one cell thick with tall cells. Specialized surface components such as microvilli and goblet cells can be seen in this slide.
That is incorrect. Click here      to learn the answer, then come back to try again.

simple columnar epithelia line surfaces involved in high rates of secretion and absorption, e.g. small intestine, where it has microvilli and goblet cells and the gall bladder, where it has microvilli.
